Name: Grapes
Effect: +1 attack damage per level of drunk.

Name: Cursed Wine Bottle
Effect: when you are drunk, your chance to miss is now 25% instead of 50%.

Name: Honey Ale
Effect: if you are drunk, reload 1 when you deal a critical hit.

Name: Beer Mug
Effect: at end of turn, heal 3 if you are drunk.
